attributes.action: Make the driver theory test available in more languages.
attributes.additional_details: Stop bringing foreign workers in to help with HGV and driving roles when we have unemployed foreign nationals at our disposal who are desperate to work and earn a living. The majority hit the hurdle when they cannot drive legally because they cannot pass a theory test.
attributes.background: Offer translation or interpretation for the theory test so that residents of England, Scotland and Wales have a fair chance at obtaining driving jobs in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

DVLA driving theory test should be available in other languages.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597801
